page.title: 15Millhead People
page.content:
OLD MILLHEAD 70% were born locally. Most families tend to be either young or retired. 10% of the workers are unemployed. Two thirds work within a mile. Some owners and a development company are improving many homes in need of indoor toilets, bathroom or shower. 72% of Millhead homes are here with 2.6 persons per household.
NEW MILLHEAD Families are 0.5 bigger, have more cars , household goods and central heating, being generally more affluent. Unemployment is low. More tend to be well skilled, in the professions or self-employed. 67% were born in the north but only 7% locally. Age groups are well balanced. 55% of workers commute. There are no amenities here.
